meta.title: Step-Free Arrival in Positano — No Street Stairs
meta.description: Our apartment offers step-free access from the road to the entrance — rare in steep Positano. No stairs, no struggle with luggage.

streetLevelArrival.heroSubtitle: No street stairs from the road to the apartment entrance
streetLevelArrival.heroBody: In a town famous for hundreds of steps, our apartment is different. Walk straight from the road to your front door — no stairs, no struggle with luggage or strollers.
streetLevelArrival.clarification: The apartment entrance is step-free from the street. Inside, the apartment is split-level with internal stairs between the living area and bedroom.

meta.title: Private Serviced Apartment in Positano
meta.description: A private 85sqm apartment with full kitchen, professionally managed with optional access to terrace, breakfast, and bar next door.

privateStay.heroSubtitle: Professionally managed with hospitality-grade support next door

privacy.title: Complete independence
privacy.body: A 85sqm apartment that is entirely yours. Full kitchen, washer and dryer, two bathrooms, and space to spread out. No shared spaces, no check-in desk — just your own front door.

support.title: Professional support when you need it
support.body: Managed by an experienced hospitality team based right next door. Need restaurant recommendations, help with directions, or assistance with anything? Professional support is a short walk away.

amenities.title: Optional extras next door
amenities.body: If you want them, a terrace with sea views, breakfast service, and a bar are available next door. Enjoy them on your schedule, or skip them entirely — the choice is yours.
